hcmut.co3003.server.util

Class RequestSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • hcmut.co3003.server.util.RequestSet

  • public class RequestSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Since:
    31/3/2018 23:14

    This class define structure of every request that the server could handle.

    A valid string for a record will have default format like this: sensor_id MM/dd/yyyy-KK:mm:ssZ ????.??K 0.????%
    You can easily get a well-formed String of a record by using FullInformationRecord
    Just create an object, set all fields, then call: String recordString = object.toRecord()

    Author:
    DuongThaiMinh
    See Also:
    FullInformationRecord, Token

        public static final Token.Type[] SET_REQUEST

      • GET_REQUEST

        public static final Token.Type[] GET_REQUEST
        Get the latest record of the sensor with specific id

        Server port listening: 10000
        Request: GET sensor_id
        Response data: 1 line
        The latest record have id=sensor_id as String with default format

        Example:

        Request: GET sensor-01
        Response: sensor-01 04/02/2018-17:00:00+0700 273.15K 0.500%

      • DOWNLOAD_REQUEST

        public static final Token.Type[] DOWNLOAD_REQUEST
        Prepare connection for getting all records of a sensor from startTimestamp to endTimestamp

        Server port listening: 10000
        Request: DOWNLOAD sensor_id startTimestamp endTimestamp
        Response data: 1 line
        portNumber OTP
        portNumber: a integer specify which port the server has opened to send records via
        OTP: a 64-char string randomly generated by server for authentication connection

      • DOWNLOAD_GET_REQUEST

        public static final Token.Type[] DOWNLOAD_GET_REQUEST
        Get all records which have been prepared by server since server receiving DOWNLOAD_REQUEST
